entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Periods of light snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
